overview:
Search Engine Optimizer

He is an organic web strategist, a self taught enthusiast who knows his way around in the ever changing lanes of SEO world. Major part of his day is spent experimenting and implementing new techniques of optimization that put a deserving web page on top ranks.

Shivbhadra believes skills and hard work are indispensable but sometimes in the world of SEO pure instincts just work like magic. He loves what he does and keeps changing, improving and perfecting his SEO strategies for better results.

When he is not thinking about SEO he likes reading, writing and watching movies.
